articles.description: Watch live coverage from game one of the best-of-seven MLB World Series between the Texas Rangers and the Arizona Diamondbacks in Arlington, Texas.
articles.title: Watch: MLB World Series - Texas Rangers v Arizona Diamondbacks

articles.description: England complete their Rugby World Cup campaign by overcoming a proud Argentina performance in the third-place play-off in Paris.
articles.title: England sneak past Pumas in third-place play-off

articles.description: England return to winning ways in the Women's Nations League with a hard-fought victory over Belgium to boost their chances of qualifying for the Olympic Games.
articles.title: Hemp gives England narrow win over Belgium

articles.description: Tottenham move five points clear at the top of the Premier League by continuing their superb start to the season with a win at Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Tottenham beat Palace to go five clear at top

articles.description: Rizwan sends reminders of Jonny Bairstow's stumping at Lord's by running Markram out but not appealing during Pakistan's Cricket World Cup match against South Africa.
articles.title: 'Lord's all over again!' - Rizwan and the stumping that wasn't

articles.description: Classy Netherlands ease to the top of Nations League Group A1 with a commanding win that leaves injury-weakened Scotland rooted to the bottom.
articles.title: Dutch thump Scots to go top of Nations League group

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen heads McLaren's Lando Norris in Friday practice at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen tops Mexico City GP practice

articles.description: A brash Tyson Fury leans on and prods Francis Ngannou as the pair weigh in for their heavyweight fight in Saudi Arabia on Saturday.
articles.title: Brash Fury prods Ngannou during Saudi weigh-in

articles.description: Germany thrash Wales 5-1 in Sinsheim as Gemma Grainger's side conceded five goals for the second successive Nations League game.
articles.title: Wales hammered by Germany in Nations League

articles.description: South Africa cling on to beat Pakistan by one wicket in the best game of the World Cup so far.
articles.title: South Africa defy Pakistan to stay on course for semis
